title: MLS NEXT Unveils Names of New Competition Tiers Ahead of 2025-26 Season
description: The program’s top tier will now be named the MLS NEXT Homegrown Division, with the new tier introduced as the MLS NEXT Academy Division MLS NEXT Fest to expand to more than 1,000 teams, marking the largest youth soccer scouting and recruiting event in North America

title: MLS NEXT Announces Transformative Sporting Initiatives for the 2025-26 Season
description: New initiatives designed to provide greater access for players to reach their full potential

title: 2025 MLS NEXT All-Star Game: East snatches late win over West
description: AUSTIN, Texas – The MLS NEXT East All-Stars scored three second-half goals, including an 85th-minute penalty kick, to secure a 4-3 comeback victory over their West counterparts on Monday night in the 2025 MLS NEXT All-Star Game presented by Allstate at Parmer Field.

title: MLS NEXT Announces 2024-25 Regular Season Award Winners
description: MVP presented by adidas and Goal of the Year presented by Allstate unveiled for each of the four age groups (U15, U16, U17, and U19)

title: Rosters for 2025 MLS NEXT All-Star Game presented by Allstate
description: MLS NEXT has announced player selections, details and broadcast information for the 2025 MLS NEXT All-Star Game presented by Allstate.

title: 2025 MLS NEXT Cup Begins June 14 as Top Clubs Chase Season-Ending Titles
description: 19 matches in the Nashville area, including four championship matches (U15, U16, U17, and U19), will stream live on MLS’ YouTube page For the first time in program history, MLS NEXT Cup will feature championship brackets for the U13 and U14 age groups, each with 24 clubs competing

title: MLS NEXT Recap: Who stood out in May 2025?
description: Below are the top performers from MLS NEXT in May 2025 you should know, including the Player and Teams of the Month.

title: MLS NEXT Recap: Who stood out in April 2025?
description: Below are the top performers from MLS NEXT in April 2025 you should know, including the Player and Teams of the Month.

title: Generation adidas Cup: Real Salt Lake trio highlight U16 Best XI
description: A second-ever triumph at the Generation adidas Cup saw Real Salt Lake win the U16 age group in dominant fashion.

title: Generation adidas Cup: Orlando City highlight U18 Best XI
description: Orlando City SC captured their first-ever Generation adidas Cup crown over the weekend, winning the competition's U18 age group.

title: Generation adidas Cup: Orlando City's Caraballo, RSL's Hashimoto highlight awards
description: For the third time in the past four years, MLS sides won both age groups at the Generation adidas Cup.

title: Generation adidas Cup: Orlando City win U18 title over Colorado Rapids
description: Orlando City SC’s U18s developed a habit of scoring early at the 2025 Generation adidas Cup, and Sunday’s final was no different.

title: Generation adidas Cup: Real Salt Lake win U16 title over LA Galaxy
description: Real Salt Lake dominated the U16 final at the 2025 Generation adidas Cup, topping the LA Galaxy by a 4-0 score.

title: Generation adidas Cup: MLS champions guaranteed after U16 & U18 semifinals
description: MLS teams enjoyed a strong showing in Saturday’s semifinals at the 2025 Generation adidas Cup.

title: Generation adidas Cup: Real Salt Lake U16s book semifinal date with KRC Genk
description: The semifinals are set at the 2025 Generation adidas Cup.
